content.raw:
We can try to use just the package name (gazebo3, gazebo3-prerelease, gazebo4, gazebo5 all of them will use just gazebo) which is the option currently implemented in this Pull Request.

Other schemas could end up in some nicer organization but would probably be harder to maintain. Other ideas are easy to maintain are very welcome.
